data.description:
About This Auction: Save-N-Go is auctioning off a large variety of returned general merchandise from big box retailers. Please view the pictures and descriptions for individual item condition.

Location: 2406 S 24th St, Building B, Ste 102, Phoenix, AZ, 85034

Preview: No Preview Available

Bidding Ends: Thursday, September 11, 2025 between 06:00:00 pm and 10:16:30 pm MT

Extended Bidding: If a bid is placed in the last 2 minutes the auction will automatically extend for an additional 2 minutes

Pickup Times: Friday 09/12/25 and Saturday 09/13/25 from 10am to 5pm.

Buyer's Premium: 15%    Tax: 9.1%
data.preview_info:
Preview Times: None

Notice of Reserves. Pursuant to UCC 2-328 and applicable state law, this is a reserve auction. The reserve price for most items is the starting bid price. If the reserve price is greater than the starting bid, Local Liquidators and its affiliates, if necessary, may bid on behalf of the seller, using one or more bidder numbers, up to the reserve price. If we have an interest in an offered lot other than our commissions, we may bid in the same manner therefore to protect such interest. As a bidder, It is your responsibility to stop bidding when you have reached the limit you are willing to pay for a particular lot. For more information about the Local Liquidators reserve policy, visit our Reserves Page by Clicking Here.
data.removal_info:
Pick Up Location: 2406 S 24th St, Building B, Ste 102, Phoenix AZ 85034 

Pick Up Times: Friday 09/12/25 and Saturday 09/13/25 from 10am to 5pm. Winning bidders MUST remove all items won within the Pick Up Times. Items not removed from the facility will be considered forfeited and no refunds will be granted!

 

Removal: Winning bidders are solely responsible for the removal of purchased items and must bring their own help and tools. If an item is hooked up to electric, water or gas, it is the buyer’s responsibility to disconnect the item and cap off any pipes or wires. Bidders are allowed to bring contractors or other help in the removal process. Sellers or their employees are will not be available to assist in removing or loading items. Everyone picking up will be required to sign a Waiver of Liability Form and will be on the property at their own risk.
data.terms:
Please make sure you have read the terms of this auction before bidding.

Bidding Starts: Saturday, September 6, 2025 at 04:58:00 pm MT
Bidding Ends: Thursday, September 11, 2025 between 06:00:00 pm and 10:16:30 pm MT
See individual items for exact closing times.
Extended Bidding: If a bid is placed in the last 2 minute(s) the auction will automatically extend for an additional 2 minute(s)
Location: 2406 S 24th St., Building B, Ste 102, Phoenix, AZ 85034

Preview Times: None

Notice of Reserves. Pursuant to UCC 2-328 and applicable state law, this is a reserve auction. The reserve price for most items is the starting bid price. If the reserve price is greater than the starting bid, Local Liquidators and its affiliates, if necessary, may bid on behalf of the seller, using one or more bidder numbers, up to the reserve price. If we have an interest in an offered lot other than our commissions, we may bid in the same manner therefore to protect such interest. As a bidder, It is your responsibility to stop bidding when you have reached the limit you are willing to pay for a particular lot. For more information about the Local Liquidators reserve policy, visit our Reserves Page by Clicking Here.

Payments: If your invoice is under $1,000, Local Liquidators will charge the credit card on file for the total of the invoice. If your invoice is over $1,000, Local Liquidators will charge a non refundable deposit of 10% to your card on file and you must pay the remainder of the invoice by cash or wire transfer no later than the next business day following the auction end.

Payment Methods Accepted: We accept credit cards for deposits and invoice payments under $1,000. We accept cash, wire/bank transfer, ACH and Zelle payments for invoices over $1,000.

Defaults: If payment in full is not received by the end of the business day following the auction close, Local Liquidators may cancel all Bids and charge the Winning Bidder a relisting fee of 25% of the total invoice amount (“Relisting Fee”) to the Winning Bidder’s credit card on file. Any Deposit paid by the Winning Bidder will be applied to the Relisting Fee.

Buyer's Premium: There is a 15% Buyer's Premium for this sale.

Sales Tax: All Purchases are subject to 9.1% sales tax. Tax applies to final bid price and buyer's premium. If you have a tax exempt or resell certificate, the certificate must be uploaded to My Account and approved prior to bidding.

Pick Up Location: 2406 S 24th St, Building B, Ste 102, Phoenix AZ 85034 

Pick Up Times: Friday 09/12/25 and Saturday 09/13/25 from 10am to 5pm. Winning bidders MUST remove all items won within the Pick Up Times. Items not removed from the facility will be considered forfeited and no refunds will be granted!

 

Removal: Winning bidders are solely responsible for the removal of purchased items and must bring their own help and tools. If an item is hooked up to electric, water or gas, it is the buyer’s responsibility to disconnect the item and cap off any pipes or wires. Bidders are allowed to bring contractors or other help in the removal process. Sellers or their employees are will not be available to assist in removing or loading items. Everyone picking up will be required to sign a Waiver of Liability Form and will be on the property at their own risk. 

Buyer's Premium: There is a 15% Buyer's Premium in effect for this auction.

By viewing or using the Local Liquidators website or participating in any auction, you are agreeing to be legally bound by our General Terms and Conditions and these Auction Details. If you do not agree with the General Terms and Conditions or Auction Details, you may not participate in any auction or continue to access or use the Local Liquidators website. Continued access or use of the Local Liquidators website, or participation in any Auction constitutes your agreement with our General Terms and Conditions and the applicable Auction Details.

Notice of Reserves. Pursuant to UCC 2-328 and applicable state law, this is a reserve auction. The reserve price for most items is the starting bid price. If the reserve price is greater than the starting bid, Local Liquidators and its affiliates, if necessary, may bid on behalf of the seller, using one or more bidder numbers, up to the reserve price. If we have an interest in an offered lot other than our commissions, we may bid in the same manner therefore to protect such interest. As a bidder, It is your responsibility to stop bidding when you have reached the limit you are willing to pay for a particular lot. For more information about the Local Liquidators reserve policy, visit our Reserves Page by Clicking Here.
